Exaggerate: The claim made by Hillary Clinton exaggerates Donald Trump's statement about his foreign-policy experience. Trump never explicitly stated that hosting the Miss Universe pageant in Russia was an example of his foreign-policy experience.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence or direct quote from Donald Trump stating that hosting the Miss Universe pageant in Russia was an example of his foreign-policy experience.
Problematic assumption: Hillary Clinton's claim assumes that hosting a beauty pageant in Russia equates to foreign-policy experience, which can be seen as a problematic assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation is that Donald Trump's mention of hosting the Miss Universe pageant in Russia was not meant to be seen as an example of his foreign-policy experience, but rather as a way to highlight his familiarity with Russia.
